name: Sunny Side Nightmare
summary:
Eddie is a clown apprentice that dreams of becoming like his now retired idol.

However the day he thinks he's finally going to debut, the Ringmaster announced that they're closing the fun side of the circus in favor of the scary side, that just the same day, is finally presenting their new show. An open house show where the public can now participate.

Needless to say, Eddie is not happy with the sudden announcement, and has some complaints to voice.

Follow Eddie inside the nightmare that is the open house and help him take his job back... or at least escape alive.
